description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models: A wire or combination of wires, with consistent electrical characteristics, building a single electrical system, used to carry alternating current between points in the power system.

contents.name: conductorType
contents.description: The conductor type the line segment.

contents.name: conductorBCH
contents.description: Positive sequence shunt (charging) susceptance, uniformly distributed, of the entire line section.  This value represents the full charging over the full length of the line. Default: 0.0

contents.name: conductorR
contents.description: The positive sequence series resistance of the entire line section.

contents.name: conductorX
contents.description: The positive sequence series reactance of the entire line section.

contents.name: segmentSequenceNumber
contents.description: It reflects a precise segment order using sequence number.

contents.name: locatedAt
contents.description: The location of the line segment
